categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic vehicles

nodes.text: The Prowler, or Rebel Prowler, was an aquatic vehicle used by the Rebel Alliance. It was a vessel with large mounted cannons, developed for shore bombardment and shelling of enemy fleets.

The Heavy Prowler was an upgraded model of the standard Prowler. The upgraded versions included two large mounted cannons as well as denser armor, including bigger stubs jutting out of the sides near the stern.
